author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GORDON EXPECTED TO TURN NORTHWARD ON TUESDAY AND COULD  RE-INTENSIFY BY MIDWEEK...
summary:
...GORDON EXPECTED TO TURN NORTHWARD ON TUESDAY AND COULD  RE-INTENSIFY BY MIDWEEK...
 As of 11:00 PM AST Mon Sep 16
 the center of Gordon was located near 19.0, -48.8
 with movement W at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Gordon (AT2/AL072024)
